column4: hello , im trying to use awstats, i get this error : Error: Couldn't open server log file "/var/log/apache2/access.log" : Permission denied , how can i give it permission to access it ?
hello , im trying to use awstats, i get this error : Error: Couldn't open server log file "/var/log/apache2/access.log" : Permission denied , how can i give it permission to access it ?
use sudo in front of the command.
